languages.text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "А ты соображаешь. Да, они просто бойцовые животные. А я — пастух, который собирает их в стадо, чтобы слуги гемункула не утруждали себя беготней по Прорве и отловом мяса для арены".

{n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."
languages.original_text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "А ты соображаешь. Да, они просто бойцовые животные. А я — пастух, который собирает их в стадо, чтобы слуги гемункула не утруждали себя беготней по Прорве и отловом мяса для арены".

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“原来你是这么想的。没错，他们只不过是牲畜而已，但我却是把他们聚集起来的牧羊人。这样血伶人的仆从就没必要千辛万苦跑遍整个裂隙，为竞技场抓来活畜。”
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“原来你是这么想的。没错，他们只不过是牲畜而已，但我却是把他们聚集起来的牧羊人。这样血伶人的仆从就没必要千辛万苦跑遍整个裂隙，为竞技场抓来活畜。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Eso es lo que tú te crees. Sí, son ganado, pero yo soy el pastor que los junta en un rebaño para que los sirvientes del Hemónculo no tengan que esforzarse en recorrer el Abismo para traer carne a la arena».
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Eso es lo que tú te crees. Sí, son ganado, pero yo soy el pastor que los junta en un rebaño para que los sirvientes del Hemónculo no tengan que esforzarse en recorrer el Abismo para traer carne a la arena».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「なるほど。確かに彼らは家畜同然の存在だが、私は彼らを群れにして集める羊飼いのようなもの。ハモンキュラスの従者たちは私のおかげでアリーナで肉を狩るために裂け目中を走り回る手間を省くことができているのだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「なるほど。確かに彼らは家畜同然の存在だが、私は彼らを群れにして集める羊飼いのようなもの。ハモンキュラスの従者たちは私のおかげでアリーナで肉を狩るために裂け目中を走り回る手間を省くことができているのだよ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Das glaubt Ihr. Ja, sie sind nur Vieh, doch ich bin der Hirte, der sie zu einer Herde versammelt, damit die Diener des Haemonculus sich nicht die Mühe machen müssen, in der ganzen Kluft nach Fleisch für die Arena zu jagen."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Das glaubt Ihr. Ja, sie sind nur Vieh, doch ich bin der Hirte, der sie zu einer Herde versammelt, damit die Diener des Haemonculus sich nicht die Mühe machen müssen, in der ganzen Kluft nach Fleisch für die Arena zu jagen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « C'est ce que vous croyez. Certes, ils ne sont rien de plus que du bétail, mais je suis le berger qui les réunit en troupeau pour que les serviteurs de l'hémoncule ne perdent pas leur temps à parcourir l'Abîme en quête de chair pour l'arène. »
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « C'est ce que vous croyez. Certes, ils ne sont rien de plus que du bétail, mais je suis le berger qui les réunit en troupeau pour que les serviteurs de l'hémoncule ne perdent pas leur temps à parcourir la Faille en quête de chair pour l'arène. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Yılan, kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Sen öyle san. Onlar besi hayvanı olabilir ama ben de çobanlarıyım. Benim sayemde Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârları, Yarık'ın dört bir yanında arenada biçilecek zavallıcık aramaya çıkmak zorunda kalmıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "That's what you think. Yes, they're just livestock, but I'm the shepherd who gathers them into a herd so the Haemonculus's servants don't have to trouble themselves running all over the Chasm catching meat for the arena."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yılan, kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Sen öyle san. Onlar besi hayvanı olabilir ama ben de çobanlarıyım. Böylece Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârları, arenada biçilecek zavallılar için Yarık boyu dolaşmak zorunda kalmıyor."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
